comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Jesus Acuna ( Jesús Acuña) was a cabinet member (minister of the interior) in the Mexican government under Carranza in 1915 and 1917. He was involved with foreign relations during the time of Pershing's pursuit of Pancho Villa in Mexico. Also identified as Jesús Mario Acuña Fadul in the position of secretary of foreign affairs (1915-1917) en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Secretariat_of_Foreign_Affairs_(Mexico) en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Secretariat_of_the_Interior_(Mexico) A biographical sketch in the Mexico Review of December, 1916: books.google.com/books?id=e4YcAQAAMAAJ&pg=PP43&lp... es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gabinete_de_Venustiano_Carranza
